name: W Scene
description: Based on the W Plot method

attributes.name: Trigger Event
attributes.description: The scene's opening event, which places the protagonist into difficult circumstances

attributes.name: 1st Turning Point
attributes.description: An event or choice that briefly improves the protagonist's circumstances

attributes.name: 2nd Trigger Event
attributes.description: An event at the "scene midpoint" that presents the protagonist with further difficulty

attributes.name: 2nd Turning Point
attributes.description: At the scene's darkest moment, circumstances improve again, leading to the scene's climax

attributes.name: Resolution
attributes.description: Wrap up the scene's central conflict and hook the reader into the next scene or chapter
